subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Islanders (23-18-5) have beaten the Devils (26-16-3) in all five games they have played this season, including a 3-1 victory on Wednesday.
snippet: The Islanders (23-18-5) have beaten the Devils (26-16-3) in all five games they have played this season, including a 3-1 victory on Wednesday.
